DaveÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Picks Volume 8 contains the complete concert from November 30, 1980, at the Fox Theatre in Atlanta, Georgia. It was produced as a limited edition of 13,000 numbered copies, and was released on November 1, 2013.
This album is the first official Grateful Dead matrix recording, which digitally combines the soundboard audio with an audience recording of the concert.
